00007 template<class T>
00008 SprHelper<T>::SprHelper(int size) : _size(size)
00009 {
00010   _flags = (bool*)malloc(size * sizeof(bool));
00011 }

00014 SprHelper<T>::~SprHelper()

00026 template<class T>
00027 void SprHelper<T>::flagSubtree(const UPTree<T>& tree, int pos, 
00028                                const BracketTable<T>& btable)
00029 {
00030   memset(_flags, false, _size * sizeof(bool));
00031   for (int i = pos; i < btable[pos].pos[1]; ++i)
00032   {
00033     if (tree[i].myType() == LEAF)
00034     {
00035       _flags[tree[i].myLabel()] = true;
00036     }
00037   }
00038 }

00044 template<class T>
00045 int SprHelper<T>::getFlaggedInverse(const UPTree<T>& tree, 
00046                                     const BracketTable<T>& btable)
00047 {
00048   int first = -1, i;
00049   int last = tree.size() - 1;
00050   for (i = 0; i < tree.size(); ++i)
00051   {
00052     if (tree[i].myType() == LEAF)
00053     {
00054       if (_flags[tree[i].myLabel()] == false)
00055       {
00056         if (first < 0)
00057           first = i;
00058       }
00059       else if (first >= 0)
00060       {
00061         last = i;
00062         break;
00063       }
00064     }
00065   }
00066   
00067   for (i = first - 1; i > 0; --i)
00068   {
00069     if (tree[i].myType() == LB)
00070     {
00071       if (btable[i].pos[1] >= last)
00072         break;
00073       else
00074         first = i;
00075     }
00076     else if (tree[i].myType() == RB)
00077       break;
00078   }
00079 
00080   assert(tree[first].myType() == LB);
00081 
00082   return first;
00083 }

00090 template<class T>
00091 T SprHelper<T>::nextLeafLabel(const UPTree<T>& tree, int pos)
00092 {
00093   for (; pos < tree.size(); ++pos)
00094     if (tree[pos].myType() == LEAF)
00095       return tree[pos].myLabel();
00096   assert(false);
00097   return -1;
00098 }
